title: Commandos.Anthology.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Commandos.Anthology.Repack-R.G.Mechanics

 <a href="
http://www.imagelink.cz/images/0b7c2a2adcd470e03cd4.png" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imagelink.cz/images/0b7c2a2adcd470e03cd4.png</a>


Release Info:


1.Commandos: Behind Enemy Lines


Game information:


Commandos: Behind Enemy Lines - tactical game real-time,
action which takes place during the Second World War.
You command a small squad of elite soldiers. Send them
into the enemy in a series of risky missions, and return
them back alive. Clever strategy has never been so vibrant.
Study the movement of the enemy, develop a careful plan,
coordinate their people and throw them into a swift and
fierce attack using all your abilities and skills.


Repack Features:

Commandos: Behind Enemy Lines
Do not cut / recoded


2.Commandos: Beyond the Call of Duty



Game information:


You have been called to active service in the Commandos,
and must now mobilize in a series of 8 new dangerous missions.
You could come with experience of action in Behind Enemy Lines,
or perhaps you are just a rookie - as if it was, you will have
a chance to show themselves to the limit in the courage and
tactics. As the leader of a small elite unit operating deep
in enemy territory, you will fall out new challenges and
goals of these new missions. As well as new vehicles,
buildings, weapons, and two levels of difficulty must
satisfy both Commandos veterans, so new recruits.


Repack Features:

Commandos: Beyond the Call of Duty
Version of the game - v1.1
Do not recoded
Cut Credits (titers developers)


3.Commandos 2: Men of Courage



Game information:


At your disposal there is a certain group of soldiers.
All of them have their own set of skills and a well-trained
to perform very complex tasks. Besides, each of them has
their own special talent that will be useful in certain
situations. Your people will help you learn more about
the enemy and develop an action plan.

In the game, you will spend your squad through a series of
missions related to the events of World War II. In each mission
you must perform a number of tasks, the results of which will
depend on your tactics skills to own a gun and to manage people.
As a rule, there is one main mission: save, scout, grab, protect,
and several minor, which will help to fulfill the main. If you
do not do the job of a mission or lose one of your people, you
have to go through the mission again.



Repack Features:

Commandos 2: Men of Courage
Game Version - v1.20
Do not cut / recoded

4.Commandos 3: Destination Berlin


Game information:

Death to the fascist invaders! With this motto peremptory American
commandos were landed behind enemy lines ... Already the second
series in a row ... Extremely realistic terrain as traced be captured
on camera people, the unique abilities of soldiers. This voltage
you will not be able to keep even drive with eroticism. As you
look at it as a partisan Natasha seduce stupid Kraut and tidy
up the rear of the enemy? Or swim with scuba diving right under
the noses of the German patrol? Stun Lieutenant Stolz? However,
it is tempting? Well, everything is in your hands.

Game Features:

12 missions with numerous cinematic scenes are divided into 3
campaigns: Stalingrad, Normandy and Central Europe, each of
which consists of a variety of tactical puzzles.
New special skills of various team members (physical strength,
agility, camouflage, climbing walls, and so on. D.).
Improved management and a new training system for each commando.
More Actions: assaults and point bombing, as well as appliances:
jeeps, motorcycles with sidecars, tanks and trucks.
Improved artificial intelligence of enemies, new enemies
(the soldiers of the SS, the Gestapo).
Stunning graphics, a fully three-dimensional engine with a
turn of 360 degrees in either direction, zooming,
and changing the landscape.
New types of weapons including mortars, machine guns,
heavy machine guns and artillery. All weapons have their
real prototypes of the Second World War.

Repack Features:

Commandos 3: Destination Berlin
Game Version - v1.42
Do not cut / recoded


5.Commandos: Strike Force



Game information:

In 1942. Europe under the control of the Wehrmacht,
and only on the Eastern Front fierce resistance of
Soviet troops did not allow Hitler to advance deep
into the Soviet Union.

Legendary fighters squad will once again penetrate
behind enemy lines to strike a powerful blow that
will help turn the tide of the war and enable the
main forces to destroy the military machine of the
Third Reich.

The most dangerous suicide mission again become the
lot of desperate commandos. But so it does not happen -
because you can not win a war without heroes.


Repack Features:

Commandos: Strike Force
Version of the game - v1.1
Do not recoded
Cut multiplayer demo and video developers
